How to earn money with OnlyFans

How to earn money with OnlyFans

Have you recently joined OnlyFans, or you're already a creator looking for ways to build a consistent income stream off your work?

How to Create a Serious Income on OnlyFans – 5 Easy Steps

Estimated Reading Time: 2 min 49 sec

80% for you, and 20% for OnlyFans, sounds lucrative, right? These numbers strongly indicate that you can make a serious income with OnlyFans. But why do many OnlyFans creators find it hard to generate a large monthly revenue ? 

One, the OnlyFans marketplace is saturated. Two, there is a crackdown on the adult content posted on OnlyFans and more.

OnlyFans saw a tremendous surge in the number of users around 2020 to 2021. According to the November 2019 statistics, OnlyFans had merely 7.5 million users; these numbers shot to 85 million as 2020 ended. 

Regardless of the two reasons and others, OnlyFans continues to thrive as it allows creators to earn income from the content they post. May it be a video, photo, audio, or live stream, the audience of the creators pays to access the content. Now, that is an advantage you cannot get from other social media platforms. Whether a beginner or expert in the OnlyFans space, here are five critical steps you must follow to create a serious income on OnlyFans:

  1. Optimize your OnlyFans profile 
  2. Create quality, consistent, and engaging content 
  3. Diversify your earning streams 
  4. Promote your content on other platforms or on your website 
  5. Seek proper guidance 

This article will guide you through the steps to earn a serious income from OnlyFans with the potential to generate a full-time income eventually. 

Make an appointment now

1. Optimize your OnlyFans profile 

Your OnlyFans profile is the first content selling point. A compelling OnlyFans profile informs your potential fan what you are all about at first glance. OnlyFans’ profile allows you to add a profile picture, cover photo, and username and tweak specific settings based on the amount you would love to earn for every sale. 

Before setting up an OnlyFans profile, reference your username on your site if you have one and on the other social media platforms. Using the same username on your OnlyFans profile boosts the chances of getting fans quickly, who are mainly your audience from the other platforms. 

For example, if you have built an audience on Instagram, create an OnlyFans profile that uses details like those on your Instagram profile. This makes it easier for you to start earning from your loyal fans because once they realize they can access exclusive content on your OnlyFans, they will gladly pay. 

  • Your OnlyFans profile cover photo should reflect the content you post.  If you can afford it, hire a graphics designer to design an eye catchy profile cover photo that clearly demonstrates the content you produce. Using your actual photo for the profile picture builds trust and makes your audience feel more connected to you. It also depicts that you are confident with the content you are producing. If you produce adult content, do not upload a nude picture of you as your profile or cover photo, OnlyFans might flag your account. 

If you are entirely new to OnlyFans or content creation and would love to get started with OnlyFans, select a content production niche and create a content creation strategy. Select the audience you would love to reach and set up your OnlyFans using a memorable username. 

  • Starting with an easy-to-read and to remember username makes it easier for your audience to trace your content. For example, a username like “fitwomen” would sell your content better if you plan to create women’s fitness content. OnlyFans uses the username within your URL, “onlyfans.com/fitwomen,” and your name, “@fitwomen,” making it easier for your audience to find you. As a beginner starting with OnlyFans, you should use the same username for your other social media platforms and websites. Do not forget to implement the profile picture and cover photo tricks mentioned. 

Whether a beginner or OnlyFans pro, your profile should have links directing your audience to other social media platforms, such as Instagram and Twitter, where your audience can view your free-mode content. You can also offer free content on OnlyFans and lock exclusive content your audience pays to view. 

If you are filling out your profile for the first time, provide accurate details and clear ID photos so that OnlyFans approves the account. OnlyFans must approve your account before you can start making money. If you have an approved account, avoid going against OnlyFans’ rules to retain your account for longer. 

These profile set-up guidelines aim to ensure that you tap into all the possibilities of your audience purchasing your exclusive content from OnlyFans by having a uniform identity on all the platforms that host your content. A uniform identity increases your credibility encouraging your audience to seek your exclusive content. Additionally, following OnlyFans rules ensures that you stay in the game for a long time and earn more income consistently. 

Setting up a profile that starts to sell in a short period requires guidance from experts with prior experience. Fandafia Agency hosts such experts, and applying to their services takes the shortest time

2. Create quality, consistent, and engaging content 

Do I have to sell adult content on OnlyFans to be successful? Do I have to be a woman to create highly-selling content on OnlyFans? No, you do not have to be a porn star, create adult content, or be a woman to sell on OnlyFans successfully. 

Adult content is popular on OnlyFans, but several creators are selling other types of content. For example, beauty experts, models, cosplayers, fitness coaches, and more are there. If you have valuable content, OnlyFans enables you to sell without boundaries.

Beautiful models do sell their content quite quickly on OnlyFans. The top earners on OnlyFans, such as Blac Chyna, Bella Thorne, and Cardi B, are all well-established women. Though, that should not turn you off as a man thinking of earning a serious income from OnlyFans. Tyga makes millions on OnlyFans from his music. Male fitness trainers and chefs are making it big on OnlyFans. So, as a man, you need to find your space and deliver helpful content. 

Did you know that couples can make a high income from OnlyFans? Couples’ content has gained popularity and large followings on OnlyFans over the years. Couples can post challenges, pranks on each other, their life stories, and more. People are more than willing to buy such content. So, what strongly impacts sales despite the content you post?

You must produce quality, consistent, and engaging content to make sales, or you risk having a bored and dissatisfied audience that will not purchase your content eventually. 

How Content Quality on OnlyFans Impacts Sales 

Shadowy, grainy, echoey content turns off viewers, and you do not want to produce such content. You are bound to lose potential buyers if you make them feel like you undervalue their time. Suppose your fan purchases content and discovers that it’s of low quality; they will click off your account and never come back for more because they have already spent money on a low-value venture. 

You do not require a professional photographer, videographer, or photo studio to take quality photos and record amazing videos. If you are on a low budget, invest in a good phone, a microphone, and lights. Use free photography and videography tutorials to learn to produce eye-candy photos and videos. 

If you can afford it, hire a professional photographer and videographer to help you produce quality content. If you are creating audio content, hire a producer. Work closely with these experts to learn from them to capture professional photos, record great audio, or shoot cinematic videos when you do not have the money to invest in them. 

The value your content holds also determines its quality. Quality content solves a specific problem in an effective and optimum time. For example, if you can offer a cooking tutorial that cuts down the cooking time to almost half, several people would be willing to pay to access that content. Quality content boosts your audience’s confidence in your skillset, making them loyal and excited as they invest their money and time to consume your content. 

Quality content boosts your niche authority and brand awareness. Your current consumers will share the word about how your content benefitted them, gaining more customers, and thus increasing the amount of money you make on OnlyFans.

How Consistency on OnlyFans Affects Sales 

Inconsistency can lead to your audience feeling cheated of their subscription fee, and they may decide to forget about you. Once people subscribe to your content, it shows that you are solving a particular problem for them, so they expect you to keep producing content that keeps solving the issue progressively. If you schedule your content publishing and inform your audience, they will anticipate and keep consuming your content because they know when you will post next. 

Consistently posting allows you to hype the upcoming posts, and your audience may be willing to pay more. Your audience will develop more trust in you, enabling you to generate more consistent income monthly. 

Stay consistent by strategizing your content production and automating the whole process. Create content earlier enough and schedule it for posting. You can use automated software to aid with posting. You do not have to be around to publish the content. You should be consistent not only in terms of posting time and content quantity but also in content quality and the type of content you post. 

Once you have selected a niche, stick to it for a more extended period to build authority, reputation, trust, and credibility in the field, increasing the amount of money you can earn on OnlyFans. 

How Engagement on OnlyFans Impacts Sales 

Who wants to pay money to watch content that they can get for free on other platforms? People find it valuable to pay you for content because they feel connected to you and trust that you can solve their problems. So, they expect you to keep in touch with them. 

If you snob your audiences’ comments and questions, they will leave and never subscribe to your content. Why? They desire someone to solve their problems at a personalized level. That is why they pay you. Set time aside to respond to your audience’s questions and get to know them better. Answering and interacting with your audience within the comment section can give you ideas about what you should post next. You understand your audience better by asking them what they would love to see next. Once your audience sees you fulfilling their needs, they will keep paying. 

You can also keep your audience engaged by presenting challenges for them to compete. Reward the winner and let them provide a testimonial to the other subscribers. This way, the subscribers will spread the news to other people earning you new subscribers and fans. 

To ensure that your past content also receives attention from your subscribers, come up with quizzes whose answers are in the other episodes. Direct your audience to watch the other episodes to find the answers and reward the winners. This way, you would ensure that your audience actively interacts with your past and present content. 

You can also boost engagement by hosting live events. Make the live events fun and charming so that your audience stays around for a long while you make more income. The trade is two-way; you give your audience attention and care, and they, in turn, pay you more, and you smile to the bank to collect that serious income you desire.

Make an appointment now

3. Diversify your OnlyFans earning streams 

OnlyFans offers you the chance to make serious income through several methods. You should use almost all the available ways to rack in more money because you have nothing to lose if you know that your profile beams value and you produce valuable content.

How to Boost your Earnings on OnlyFans- 6 Tips

  • Subscription fees 

At the basic level, OnlyFans pays you through a monthly subscription model. OnlyFans’ minimum subscription fee is $4.99. You have the liberty to change the subscription fee up to about $49. OnlyFans takes a cut of 20% for every paying and recurring subscriber, and you keep 80% of the earnings. The more subscribers you have, the greater your earning potential. While calculating your net profit, include the applicable tax charges to your location. 

Before you decide on the price to charge for your content, research to determine the average market price, and you should price your content fairly. Many OnlyFans creators charge a flat subscription fee of $9.99. Ensure your pricing reflects the value and quality your content offers to the audience; else, you risk losing subscribers.

OnlyFans allows you to promote your discounted rates at any time. Use discounted subscriptions to encourage your initial audience to keep paying and to attract new consumers. Additionally, you can offer free trials before a subscriber starts to pay to attract new subscribers or retain your current ones. 

OnlyFans also provides you with the option of creating your affiliate program. You can offer a subscriber a free month of viewing your posts for every paying referral they get you. This is a good trade-off because you get to increase your fan base, earning you more. 

  • Tips 

Tipping is another excellent way to make money on OnlyFans. You can request your audience to tip you through private messages. You would want to encourage your viewers to tip you if they find your content valuable. Please do not make it seem mandatory because you are better off keeping your subscribers rather than pestering them to give you tips because they might unsubscribe. 

When you go live, take advantage of the tips, and host a session full of fun activities and quality content. Subscribers who feel touched by your content will tip you. Additionally, create a “Tip Menu” to collect tips even when you are not hosting a live session. This way, you can earn passively from your previous posts. 

  • Pay-per-view content and messages 

Pay-per-view messages conceal videos or images behind a paywall. The receiver must pay to view the content. This OnlyFans feature is an excellent way of selling exclusive content many of your subscribers requested. The minimum amount you can charge a minimum of $3 for every pay-per-view message you send. 

Use the pay-per-view messaging feature to request payment from fans who request custom videos and photos. For every positive response you get once you have delivered the custom content, keep in touch with the subscriber to see if they need more. 

OnlyFans provides you with a mass messaging system that you can use to promote your upcoming content to your current subscribers. Use this feature to ensure your current subscribers do not miss your content. You can also send time-limited pay-per-view messages. Time-limiting a message makes your subscribers curious, and they may become anxious about not wanting to miss your content, finally triggering them to pay to view the content. That way, you would make more income. 

  • Sponsored content 

Brands are always in search of endorsers. The only way to capture the attention of brands in your niche is by amassing a decent subscription of loyal fans. You are better off working with brands in the same market space as yours because your audience might have questions to verify why they should use the brand’s merchandise. 

 If you plan to endorse brands that do not resonate with the content you are producing, direct your audience to the brand’s website, where they can find answers to all the questions they may have. This way, you will not risk tarnishing your brand in case all does not go well for your subscribers as they use the brand’s products. 

  • Affiliate marketing 

Affiliate marketing refers to a referral program where you earn a commission for every subscriber you refer to a product, and they make a purchase. Some affiliate marketing programs only require that your referral click their link or sign up for a newsletter. This would be a great way to earn extra income without depending on the referral to purchase a product. 

Do research to find lucrative affiliate marketing programs such as ShareASale and Amazon Affiliates, select the product you would love to promote, get your link, and embed it within your OnlyFans content. You will earn based on the promotion terms for every product you promote. 

Before promoting a product, research whether it is legit or fraudulent; this ensures that your subscribers do not lose their money through your brand, protecting your brand’s image. 

Some affiliate programs allow you to earn for a lifetime once a referral makes a purchase. Look for these affiliate programs and promote the products so that you can have a recurring monthly gain for every subscriber who signs up for the program or purchases a product through your link. 

  • Live to stream 

OnlyFans offers you two live-streaming earning models. You can do this either through tips or gated streams. 

OnlyFans tipping system resembles that of Twitch’s bids. While you are streaming, your generous and entertained subscribers can tip you. To earn more tips, you can create a goal-led challenge, such as asking your audience to help you raise a specific amount of money for a good cause. 

Gate streams allow subscribers who have paid a fee to access your live stream. You collect a fee from every subscriber who successfully joins your meeting. To gain more from gated streams, hype your upcoming streams and give your subscribers an offer they cannot skip. 

4. Promote your content on other platforms or on your website 

You are better off using OnlyFans to sell your exclusive content and posting free content on other social media platforms to create interest. Furthermore, a personal website would allow you to implement different marketing strategies unavailable on OnlyFans. 

Popular social media platforms such as Twitter, Reddit, and TikTok host billions of people and give you access to other content creation and marketing features. You can also network with other OnlyFans creators within other socials. 

To successfully amass a massive following on other social media platforms, you must understand their rules and regulations and how they work. Despite OnlyFans allowing adult content on their platform, several social media platforms geared toward families prohibit their users from posting adult content. For example, TikTok and Facebook prohibit their users from posting adult content. 

Social media platforms connect people using different methods. For example, Reddit is community-based, while TikTok focuses on short videos. To market your content on Reddit, you must first research and determine the community your content would suit.

Some social media platforms that allow users to form communities and also have different rules and guidelines on how to behave in those communities or groups. For example, moderators manage and take down Reddit posts that violate community rules. On the other hand, group administrators manage Facebook groups.

Generally, you must study these social media platforms, master their restrictions and proper-use guidelines, and know how to structure your content in a way that fits into their respective terms and conditions. Otherwise, you risk losing your account and all your followers. You can avoid the unexpected loss of followers by having your website. Sometimes, a random user on any social media platform might report your content claiming that it goes against the rules leading to a sudden permanent ban. A personal website protects you from losing followers if you have already familiarized them with the site. 

A personal website gives you complete control over what to show or promote to your audience. You incur maintenance costs only. Invest in a personal website and ensure that you direct all your followers to the website by embedding a link to your site on all the social media platforms you use. It would be best if you also had your website link embedded within your OnlyFans profile to retain your source of income in case OnlyFans takes down your profile. 

You might never know what might happen; having your website where you can continue selling your content even when OnlyFans bans your account is a great strategy.

You can recreate another OnlyFans account, direct your traffic to the new OnlyFans account, and keep earning. Remember, your goal is to ensure you make serious income from OnlyFans and have a backup plan even when OnlyFans takes you down. 

5. Seek proper guidance

Making serious income on OnlyFans takes time, proper strategizing, patience, and consistency. You can try to implement all the mentioned ways to amass a huge subscriber base and keep earning a steady income from OnlyFans, though seeking help makes everything much more straightforward. 

An OnlyFans agency such as Fandafia caters to all your OnlyFans needs, from responding to fans, distributing and promoting your content, optimizing your page for success, selling your pay-per-view content, to organizing and posting your content. 

Conclusion

Engaging an agency exposes you to a team of experts who know how to handle everything regarding OnlyFans. You will have peace of mind knowing that you can rest and earn while Fandafia handles everything. It all starts with an appointment, and you will be on your way to making a serious OnlyFans Income.
